title: Footprints and Hearts
body:
People come and [C] go, [G] in and [Am] out of your [F] life

bodyLyrics:
People come and go, in and out of your life
People come and go, go, go 
People come and go, in and out of your life
People come and go, go, go 

Few of us stick around for a lifetime
Most are here for a season
Love is love and never goes away
The world’s like that for no reason

People come and go, in and out of your life
People come and go, go, go 
People come and go, in and out of your life
People come and go, go, go 

Satisfied with your love
I’m satisfied with your love 
Satisfied with your love
I’m satisfied with your love 

Hellos and goodbyes are difficult
What makes someone stay in our lives
Nothing’s the same, everything’s changing
The world’s like that for no reason

People come and go, in and out of your life
People come and go, go, go 
People come and go, in and out of your life
People come and go, go, go
